channel.title: Mod ring
channel.description: Hello.. i wanna know how to make a mod ring but it doesnt make it so it hits 99's i want one to keep my hp at the lvl that i put it on,( eg. I put the ring on at 46 hp. a monster hits 46 on me and then my hp goes back up straght away) if anyone knows what im talking about could u help me??

item.title: Mod ring
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Under your process method add:

if(playerEquipment[playerRing] == RINGID && playerLevel[3] <= 46) { // Change 46 to w/e, IDC. currentHealth = 99; }

Read full topic

item.title: Mod ring
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“Kalphiter, post:8, topic:251440”][quote author=chassy13 link=topic=331891.msg2590444#msg2590444 date=1229736580]

Some file called items.cfg or something, find the ID of the item you want to edit. Make all the bonuses 99.

If you don’t understand the numbers, look in-game and go to the wield interface. Wear the ring and compare the numbers.

Read the topic; that’s not what he wants.
[/quote]He wanted a ring that hits 99, read again. I answered part of his problem as long as he understands it.[/quote]

You just humiliated yourself basically…

Read full topic

item.title: Mod ring
item.dc:creator: @grimreaper61 grimreaper61
item.description:
@grimreaper61 wrote:

[quote=“Kalphiter, post:8, topic:251440”][quote author=chassy13 link=topic=331891.msg2590444#msg2590444 date=1229736580]

Some file called items.cfg or something, find the ID of the item you want to edit. Make all the bonuses 99.

If you don’t understand the numbers, look in-game and go to the wield interface. Wear the ring and compare the numbers.

Read the topic; that’s not what he wants.
[/quote]He wanted a ring that hits 99, read again. I answered part of his problem as long as he understands it.[/quote]
actually he wants a ring that makes him impervious to attack without giving him infinite hp.
I have only seen one instance of this, but it seems quite pointless. Just change your hp to infinity and save yourself alot of coding.

Read full topic

[quote=“chassy13, post:4, topic:251440”]if(playerEquipment[playerRing] == #### && playerLevel[3] <=1) { currentHealth = 99; }
That might work on an All-Star base.[/quote]
where would you put that
